Xd_sample:
Enter the diamagnetic susceptibility of the sample.
If set to 0, the value will be replaced by -6e-7*M_sample internally.
Look up values in units of emu/mol ~ emu/(Oe*mol) in DOI: 10.1021/ed085p532.
Keyword: 'Xd_sample'
M_sample:
Enter the molar mass of the sample in g/mol
Keyword: 'M_sample'
var_amounts:
Insert variable amount terms as 'sus1,amount1,sus2,amount2,sus3,amount3,...'
Keyword: 'var_amount'
m_sample:
Enter a sample mass in mg
Keyword: 'm_sample'
